Meet Francis your dedicated personal trainer

Why choose Francis?

Francis is not just a personal trainer; he has wealth of experience in weight lifting, kettlebells, and conditioning.

Francis can develop workouts that cater to all fitness levels, ensuring you make progressive strides towards your goals.

Since 2012 Francis has been training clients and honing his skills. He enjoys doing marathons and has a vast experience around CrossFit and optimal training techniques.

He will keep your workouts fresh and energising with the expertise to work around any problems encountered.

What sets Francis apart is his deep-rooted passion for nutrition. He understands the intricate relationship between what you eat and how you feel and perform.

With his guidance, you will gain a profound understanding of nutrition and how to create balanced eating habits that support your fitness aspirations.

Join Francis now on a transformative journey where fitness and nutrition go hand in hand, and discover a healthier, stronger, and more vibrant you!
